answers.answer: Hi,Are there other symptoms present? There are many things that can cause painful tongue bumps such as trauma ( accidentally biting your tongue, grinding he teeth or scalding it), canker sores, enlarged papillae, and certain medical conditions ( diabetes and anemia).  If it persists, have this evaluated further by your doctor or dentist for proper management. Direct clinical examination will help determine the proper diagnosis.Take care and keep us posted.

question: I have a small bump on the left side of my tongue all the way to the back.It is very painful
title: Bump
